name: Swap Café
description:
Welcome to Swap Café!

You're a barista at a cozy little café. Make drinks and serve them to earn points! Completed for the Cozy Fall Jam 2022. The theme was Trading Places, thus the mechanics of swapping blocks, and swapping cups.

All art, music, sound effects, and programming was done by me, with a little help from friends and Dall-e 2. Hope you have fun!

Controls

Use a gamepad or keyboard

ControlPadKeySwap blocksXSpaceMoveD-PadWASDRotate CupsLT/RTQ/EDump Cup under current machineTriangleCtrl
